main.title: Our main initiatives are:
initiatives: End preventable deaths of newborns and children
Supporting mental health issues and awareness
Reduce premature mortality from non-communicable diseases

steps.title: Analyse and research
steps.description: Analyse and research current health infrastructure and identify any outstanding gaps in the services which can be further developed and improved.

steps.title: Planning
steps.description: Develop targeted interventions and implement new and effective strategies such as reseource allocation in which these new strategies can positively impact the community.

steps.title: Implementation and execution
steps.description: Implement and Execute health programs and monitor progress which allows further improvements to be made within the programs if needed.

steps.title: Evaluation
steps.description: Measure the outcomes and adjust strategies based on results

recommendations.title: Healthcare Access
recommendations.description: Implement mobile health units for rural areas and expand telemedicine services

recommendations.title: Mental Health
recommendations.description: Integrate mental health services into primary care and increase funding for community programs

recommendations.title: Prevention
recommendations.description: Strengthen early detection programs and health education initiatives

footer.title: Sustainability Advisory Committee
footer.description: Supporting local policy makers in sustainable development.

mainbanner.title: No Poverty
mainbanner.subtitle: End poverty in all its forms everywhere.

stats.description: People will be living in extreme poverty by 2030
Of the worlds population live in extreme poverty, or under $2.15 a day
People lack access to basic financial services

items.title: Eradicate extreme poverty
items.description: Eradicate extreme poverty for all people everywhere, currently measured as people living on less than $1.25 a day.

items.title: Reduce Poverty By At Least 50%
items.description: By 2030, reduce at least by half the proportion of men, women and children of all ages living in poverty in all its dimensions according to national definitions.

items.title: Implement Social Protection Systems
items.description: Implement nationally appropriate social protection systems and measures for all, including floors, and by 2030 achieve substantial coverage of the poor and the vulnerable.

items.title: Build Resilience to Environmental, Economic and Social Disasters
items.description: Build the resilience of the poor and those in vulnerable situations and reduce their exposure and vulnerability to extreme events.
